data.title: Suman Chellani Biography | Miss India Intercontinental’18
data.meta_description: A beauty queen, an actor, and anchor, an experienced professional in events and a successful model, Suman Chellani has achieved several credits to her name. Suman Chellani is the first Gujarati girl…
data.text:
A beauty queen, an actor, and anchor, an experienced professional in events and a successful model, Suman Chellani has achieved several credits to her name. Suman Chellani is the first Gujarati girl to have represented India at international levels. Throughout her career, she has earned several awards and titles. She belongs to the Sindhi community who represented India in Miss intercontinental in 47 years of this pageant.

She has a successful career and has hosted about 2000 events on the national as well as international level. Suman Chellani has achieved it all, the glamour, the fame, the glitz, and whatnot. Because of her determination and hard work, she has passed through every struggle and came out in flying colors. Suman Chellani wasn’t born with a silver spoon. She didn’t have any godfather to support her in her career. She is completely a self-made person building her career with tears, toil, and sweat. Check here to know more about Suman Chellani Biography.

Early life and education

She has excelled in her academic life as well. It has been as flourishing and far-reaching as her profession. She has studied a master’s in business admission from St. Xavier’s school in Ahmedabad. Not only that, but she also holds a diploma degree in French studies. Besides, she has also done diploma courses in aviation, travel, and hospitality management. She has mastered the art of 6 different languages and can speak and write in each one of them and also greet in 22 languages. All through her life, she has made people happy and worked towards increasing her intellect.

Suman Chellani Career

Her pageant journey started in 2009 when she participated in her inter-college Mr and miss universe competition and secured 3rd position there. She also became Ahmedabad city finalist at the Yamaha fascino miss Diva universe 2017 organized by the Times’ group. In addition to all this Suman Chellani ranked among the top 30 most desirable women of Ahmedabad by times group in 2017. All that she has achieved in her fashion career is credited to her mentor and pageant coach miss Ritika ramtri.

She has even anchored events attended by personalities like our Indian Prime Minister N. Modi, former Chief Minister of Gujarat Anandiben Patel, and other important figures.

Here is the voice that clients look for. Hers is the personality that adds dimension and value to the events she attends. She has even made it in the Bollywood industry. She appeared in a cameo role in 2 states, opposite Arjun Kapoor, Amrita Singh, and Alia Bhatt. Besides acting in films, she has produced two of her albums ” Hindustan and tere aane se “. Being an anchor, she has exemplary public speaking and oratory skills. All this helped her during her pageant finale rounds confidently. She could face the judges and give a proper answer to their questions clearly.

Career highlights

Suman’s achievements reflect her successful and thriving career. Below given is a list of the awards and achievements she has been bestowed with:

Miss Gujarat award in 2011

City finalist Miss Diva universe 2017 award

Suman Chellani also won Miss India Intercontinental in 2018. At this event, she successfully and proudly represented India proudly among 91 global countries.

Suman Chellani included in the Top 50 Most Influential women worldwide in a Coffee table book

She Shared space with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Sushma Swaraj, Alka Banerjee, Sister Shivani, Ekta Kapoor, Freida pinto, Hema Malini, Mira Nair, Nita Ambani and many more

She ranked 13th out of the 15 finalist contestants ranked by people’s choice in the Philippines. Not only has she represented India in the 13th rank, but also has won the title twice.

To sum up
